name: puissance
content:
puissance noun
(HORSE EVENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U or S ] (also Puissance) a competition in the sport of showjumping that tests how high horses can jump over special fences or walls: David McPherson on Sheerwater Baghera won the Puissance, the only one of three finalists to clear a 6ft 9in wall.
More examplesFewer examplesThey are due to compete in April's British Open Show Jumping Championship, which features international showjumping classes, including the Puissance, where riders face the famous wall - often 7ft high.Morrissey and Scaraberas finished third this past summer at a Puissance in Dublin in driving rain.The success of the TV show has revived interest in the sport, and puissance is the hardcore event of showjumping -a sort of equestrian fundamentalism.Third place went to Norway's Geir Gulliksen on the puissance specialist Alex, who stopped once at the wall before clearing it at the second attempt.
